title: constantly disconnect
body: after the new patch 8.10, me and my friend keep disconnecting from game per game at the same time. we live in different area but both with telstra nets. it is pretty annoying if we continually dc and interrupt. please look in to it.

replies.body: Yeap, same here. Thought it was just lag but it's constant and consistent. Telstra too so maybe it's got something to do with them.
Same problem here.. also telstra happens to me every game.
